Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Relates to authorizing the village of Malverne to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
Summary: Authorizes the village of Malverne to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to develop new parkland or capital improvements to existing parks within the village.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the village of Malverne to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
